Reference

Package

midfieldr

Tools for Student Records Research

Case data for examples

case_fye

Imputed starting majors for FYE students

case_program_group

CIP case data for four programs

case_stickiness

Stickiness case data

CIP data

cip

Classification of instructional programs (CIP) data

cip_bio_sci cip_engr cip_math_stat cip_other_stem cip_phys_sci cip_stem

Named series of 6-digit CIP codes

Analysis

cip_filter()

Filter by CIP data

cip_label()

Add a column of program labels to a CIP data frame

starter_filter()

Filter student data for starting students

ever_filter()

Filter term data for enrolled students

grad_filter()

Filter degree data for graduating students

multiway_order()

Prepare multiway data for graphing

race_sex_join()

Join student demographics

Graph helpers

scale_x_log10_expon() theme_midfield()

Graphics utility functions

rcb()

Hex color codes from RColorBrewer

rcb_colors

Named colors from the ColorBrewer palettes
